feed.title: theo’s log
feed.subtitle: Obsessed with the feeling of getting shit done, so I'm keeping a record of (a small part of) the daily shit I handle, plus half-assed technical notes.

entry.title: milestone day
entry.content:
Finished the Chinese subtitles for the complete season of This Is Going To Hurt(2022) today (just for fun), which took me 7 weekends by now and brought up lots of feelings.

Obviously total obsession is the guarantee of efficiency.
entry.summary: Finished the Chinese subtitles for the complete season of This Is Going To Hurt(2022) today (just for fun), which took me 7 weekends by now and brought up lots of feelings.

entry.title: hello world
entry.content:
5 mins to set up the site,

then another 5 hours to pick up a theme,

now here we are.
entry.summary: 5 mins to set up the site,
